thread.title: Republican memo a bid to ensure FBI surveillance conducted correctly: U.S. House Speaker

title: Republican memo a bid to ensure FBI surveillance conducted correctly: U.S. House Speaker
text:
Republican memo a bid to ensure FBI surveillance conducted correctly: U.S. House Speaker Thursday, February 01, 2018 - 01:23 
U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Thursday a Republican-drafted memo on FBI surveillance was not an indictment of the law enforcement agency or the Justice Department but a legitimate effort to make sure FBI surveillance is conducted correctly. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
